body:
I see the same thing, so it's not just you. :-)

I can run without arguments, giving the help display, but any assembly argument gives that result. That includes 'junk.dll'.

It is the ExtensionService. When initializing, it throws at CecilExtensions.cs, line 53, which is the first point where Resolve is called on a type reference. This method converts the reference to a full-fledged type description, which requires Cecil to locate all referenced assemblies. I'll have to read up on how Cecil searches for assemblies.
I have same issue in just downloaded nunit3-beta5

@roboter We changed code and fixed the issue a few weeks ago, so it's unlikely that it's actually the same cause. But if you can give a description of how to reproduce this, we can reopen this or start a new issue.

Steps to reproduce
I created new project in VisualStudio2015
add Nunit 3.0beta-5 to nuget 
project available on github https://github.com/roboter/NUnit3.0DemoPtoject
run all tests from studio - results ok

create bat file (available in github too) 
C:\"Program Files (x86)"\nunit3-beta-5\bin\nunit-console.exe
C:\"Program Files (x86)"\nunit3-beta-5\bin\nunit-console.exe [full Path to dll]\UnitTestDemo.dll
 pause

first nunit-console without any parameters - display help 
second run 

NUnit Console Runner 3.0.5767
Copyright (C) 2014 Charlie Poole

Failed to resolve assembly: 'nunit.engine.api, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=neutral,
 PublicKeyToken=2638cd05610744eb'
Got the same issue today when installing NUnit 3.0 beta5 from nunit.org
As workaround you could copy nunit.engine.api.dll to the "addins" directory
Workaround is good. Problem is with Cecil trying to load the api assembly rather than the actual .NET load.

Hi!
Trying out the new _NUnit_ `3`. Previously running the `2.6.3` version. I did the following steps:
1. Copy the `nunit.engine.api.dll` to the `nunit.org\bin\addins`.
2. Changed the command parameters from `/` to `--`.
3. Removed old command parameters, i.e. `nodots`.
4. Updated the batch command in my Jenkins, see below.
5. Investigating error in Jenkins module _Publish NUnit test result report_, looking for an update of the [nunit plugin](https://github.com/jenkinsci/nunit-plugin).

``` batch
@echo off
:: Windows cmd-file
:: Runs all debug unit tests for all NUnit-project files below current directory.
:: NUnit-Console | http://nunit.org/index.php?p=nunit-console&r=3.0

:: Assume Unit test runner in path
where /q nunit-console.exe || for %%l in (echo goto:end) do %%l ERROR: Unit test runner program 'nunit-console.exe' cannot be found.

:test
echo Processing Unit test runner, please wait...
dir /b /s *.nunit | find /i /v "\tags\" | find /i /v "\branches\" | find /i /v "\packages\" > tests.txt
for /f "tokens=*" %%i in ('type tests.txt') do (
    echo Processing: %%~nxi
    nunit-console "%%i" --result="%%~dpiUnitTestResults.xml" --config:Debug
)

echo Unit test done.
:end
```
